Everbrite, LLC will not collect any personally-identifiable information ("personal data") about you (e.g., your name, address, telephone number or email address) through our web sites unless you have provided it to us voluntarily. If you do not wish to have your personal data collected, please do not submit it to us.
When you do provide us with personal data, we may use that information in the following ways, unless stated otherwise: we may store and process that information to better understand your needs and how we can improve our products and services.
